name: Robin
greetingText: Like a novel, I discover myself each and every day! Thank you, God, for gifting me the gift of existence!
wishText: Living Life like a Dream. Living it right that's the theme ;)
textInChatBox: You rock! Thanks for the birthday wishes, everyone!
text2: As I was going through the your heart felt well wishes,
text3: an idea flashed and I stopped.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: I GOT ONE LIFE TO BALL!
outroText: Okay, now Dm me your views and feel free to fork my repo.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
